    public class AIBoat
extends Boat
    Represents the AI's boat.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AIBoat

        public AIBoat(float x,
              float y,
              float targetSpeed)
        Construct a AIBoat object at point (x,y) with default size, texture and animation.
        Parameters:
        x - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        y - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        targetSpeed - The speed that the boat should aim to go at, as a decimal percentage

    • Method Detail

      • updatePosition

        public void updatePosition(float deltaTime,
                           CollisionTree collisionObjects)
        Updates position of objects AIBoat based on acceleration and stamina.

        Checks if AIBoat can turn and updates position accordingly based on any collision objects that may overlap.

        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time since the last frame
        collisionObjects - List of Collision Objects

      • castRay

        public float castRay(float startX,
                     float startY,
                     float angle,
                     CollisionTree collisionObjects)
        Helper function to cast a ray and get the distance to the nearest object
        Parameters:
        startX - The x coordinate to start the cast from
        startY - The y coordinate to start the cast from
        angle - The angle to cast the ray at, in degrees clockwise
        collisionObjects - The collision objects to check against
        Returns:
        The distance to the nearest object, or ray_range if nothing is nearby
